r.d: SQLite is a C library that implements an embeddable SQL database engine. Programs that link with the SQLite library can have SQL database access without running a separate RDBMS process. This extension allows you to access SQLite databases from within PHP. Windows binary available from: http://snaps.php.net/win32/PECL_STABLE/php_sqlite.dll
r.n: Upgraded libsqlite to version 2.9.11 Fixed crash bug in module shutdown Fixed crash with empty queries Fixed column name mangling bug
